entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
